"Astarte": "Nice to meet you! I am ARKS Basic Instruction Officer Astarte."
"Allow me to explain the new hands-on training program, \"<c ff4f3f>ARKS Missions<c>\"."
"Completing various tasks to learn more about ARKS and the world... This is what \"<c ff4f3f>ARKS Missions<c>\" are for."
"Anyway, let's actually see it for ourselves. Just this once, we'll open the <c ff4f3f>main menu<c> automatically..."
"Go to the \"<c ff4f3f>Quest<c>\" section, and select \"<c ff4f3f>ARKS Missions<c>\"."
"Do you understand how to check <c ff4f3f>ARKS Missions<c>?"
"Now, let's find out how to proceed with a \"<c ff4f3f>Mission<c>\"."
"Talk to Rebecca, and start \"<c ff4f3f>Meeting Xion<c>\" from \"<c ff4f3f>Story Quests<c>\"."
